rules_text:
Choose two. You may choose the same mode more than once.
• Time travel. [i](For each suspended card you own and each permanent you control with a time counter on it, you may add or remove a time counter.)[/i]
• Copy the next instant or sorcery spell you cast this turn.
• Counter target spell. Its controller loses 2 life.
• Gain control of target creature until end of turn, it gains haste until end of turn. Untap it.
